results.name: a(1) = 0; for n>1, a(n) = 1 if n is a power of 2, otherwise a(n) = 2.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
formula: a(1) = 0, for n > 1, a(n) = 2 - A209229(n). - _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 19 2017
